credit_line: Gift of Susan W. Paine in honor of Stephen D. Paine, Class of 1954
title: Untitled
medium: paper collage on wood and metal
description: This work has the illusion of an abstract painting from afar, yet is clearly a patchwork of collaged elements when viewed more closely. Berlant is known for creating delicate shapes with metal and here he has made a shadow box frame out of the material, complete with his characteristic steel brads. The paper collage at the center unites disparate images of a woman's head, palm tree, dog's mouth, and cat's eyes.
inscriptions: label on back: Margo Leavin Gallery/812 n. robertson boulevard. los angeles. calif. 90069/(213) 273-0603
